name: Stack Knife - Slices Masters
description:
Press and hold on the screen and let the knife go down without touching the obstacles! 

Hold as long as possible to make combo and break the fruit blocks. Let the knife fall down from the helix stacks.

How to Play
- Just hold your finger to increase the rate of knife fall.
- Don't break or touch the Knife stacks.
- Help your Knife to reach the bottom of the fruit tower.

Feature
- One tap and easy control.
- 300+ exciting levels.
- Nice graphics and animtaion.
- Addictive gameplay.
- Great time killer game.
